mapper.insert: INSERT INTO photoGal (photoNum, species, saveFilename, subject, content, num) VALUES (photoGal_seq.NEXTVAL, #{species}, #{saveFilename}, #{subject}, #{content},#{num})
mapper.select: SELECT photoNum, species, saveFilename, subject, content, m.userName, m.userId, TO_CHAR(p.created,'YYYY-MM-DD') created, hitCount FROM photoGal p JOIN member m ON p.num=m.num WHERE photoNum=#{photoNum}
mapper.update: UPDATE photoGal SET hitCount=hitCount+1 WHERE photoNum=#{photoNum}
UPDATE photoGal SET species=#{species}, subject=#{subject}, content=#{content}, saveFilename=#{saveFilename} WHERE photoNum=#{photoNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO photoGalReply (replyNum, photoNum, num, content) VALUES(photoGalReply_seq.NEXTVAL, #{photoNum}, #{num}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(replyNum),0) FROM photoGalReply WHERE photoNum=#{photoNum}
